author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Indus Sees Revenues Rising To 1.65-1.70 Bln Euros in 2017
text:
March 27 (Reuters) - Indus Holding AG:
* ‍SUCCESSFUL START TO 2018​ * ‍PROJECTS CONSOLIDATED SALES REVENUES OF BETWEEN EUR 1.65 BILLION AND EUR 1.70 BILLION FOR 2018​
* SEES 2018 EBIT AT BETWEEN EUR 154 MILLION AND EUR 160 MILLION​
* ‍THESE TARGET FIGURES DO NOT INCLUDE PLANNED NEW ACQUISITIONS AT FIRST AND SECOND TIER​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
